verses.verse: It shall be,<WH935> when you have come in to the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you for an inheritance,<WH5159> and possess<WH3423> it,<WH3427> and dwell therein,

that you shall take<WH3947> of the first<WH7225> of all the fruit<WH6529> of the ground,<WH127> which you shall bring<WH935> in from your land<WH776> that Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you;<WH7760> and you shall put it in a basket,<WH2935> and shall go<WH1980> to the place<WH4725> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose,<WH977> to cause his name<WH8034> to dwell there.<WH7931>

You shall come<WH935> to the priest<WH3548> who shall be in those days,<WH3117> and tell<WH559> him,<WH5046> "I profess this day<WH3117> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> that I am come<WH935> to the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to our fathers<WH1> to give us.<WH5414>"
The priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the basket<WH2935> out of your hand,<WH3027> and set it down<WH3240> before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

You shall answer<WH6030> and say<WH6030> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> "A Syrian<WH761> ready to perish<WH6> was my father;<WH1> and he went down<WH3381> into Egypt,<WH4714> and lived<WH1481> there,<WH4592> few in<WH4962> number;<WH1471> and he became there a nation, great,<WH1419> mighty,<WH6099> and populous.<WH7227>
The Egyptians<WH4713> dealt<WH7489> ill with us,<WH6031> and afflicted us,<WH5414> and laid on us hard<WH7186> bondage:<WH5656>

and we cried<WH6817> to Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of our fathers,<WH1> and Yahweh<WH3068> heard<WH8085> our voice,<WH6963> and saw<WH7200> our affliction,<WH6040> and our toil,<WH5999> and our oppression;<WH3906>

and Yahweh<WH3068> brought us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and with great<WH1419> terror,<WH4172> and with signs,<WH226> and with wonders;<WH4159>
and he has brought<WH935> us into this place,<WH4725> and has given<WH5414> us this land,<WH776> a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>

Now,<WH935> behold, I have brought the first<WH6529> of the fruit of the ground,<WH127> which you,<WH3068> Yahweh, have given<WH5414> me.<WH3240>" You shall set it down before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

You shall rejoice<WH8055> in all the good<WH2896> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> to you,<WH1004> and to your house, you,<WH3881> and the Levite, and the foreigner<WH1616> who is in the midst of you.<WH7130>

When you have made an end<WH3615> of tithing<WH6237> all the tithe<WH4643> of your increase<WH8393> in the third<WH7992> year,<WH8141> which is the year<WH8141> of tithing,<WH4643> then you shall give<WH5414> it to the Levite,<WH3881> to the foreigner,<WH1616> to the fatherless,<WH3490> and to the widow,<WH490> that they may eat<WH398> within your gates,<WH8179> and be filled.<WH7646>

You shall say<WH559> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> "I have put away<WH1197> the holy things<WH6944> out of my house,<WH1004> and also have given<WH5414> them to the Levite,<WH3881> and to the foreigner,<WH1616> to the fatherless,<WH3490> and to the widow,<WH490> according to all your commandment<WH4687> which you have commanded<WH6680> me:<WH5674> I have not transgressed any of your commandments,<WH4687> neither have I forgotten them:<WH7911>

I have not eaten<WH398> of it in my mourning,<WH205> neither have I put away<WH1197> of it,<WH2931> being unclean, nor given<WH5414> of it for the dead:<WH4191> I have listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> my God;<WH430> I have done<WH6213> according to all that you have commanded me.<WH6680>

Look down<WH8259> from your holy<WH6944> habitation,<WH4583> from heaven,<WH8064> and bless<WH1288> your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and the ground<WH127> which you have given<WH5414> us,<WH7650> as you swore to our fathers,<WH1> a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>"

This day<WH3117> Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> commands<WH6680> you to do<WH6213> these statutes<WH2706> and ordinances:<WH4941> you shall therefore keep<WH8104> and do<WH6213> them with all your heart,<WH3824> and with all your soul.<WH5315>

You have declared<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> this day<WH3117> to be your God,<WH430> and that you would walk<WH3212> in his ways,<WH1870> and keep<WH8104> his statutes,<WH2706> and his commandments,<WH4687> and his ordinances,<WH4941> and listen<WH8085> to his voice:<WH6963>

and Yahweh<WH3068> has declared<WH559> you this day<WH3117> to be a people<WH5971> for his own possession,<WH5459> as he has promised<WH1696> you,<WH8104> and that you should keep all his commandments;<WH4687>

and to make<WH5414> you high<WH5945> above all nations<WH1471> that he has made,<WH6213> in praise,<WH8416> and in name,<WH8034> and in honor;<WH8597> and that you may be a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> as he has spoken.<WH1696>
